document_data.mainbody:
odolfo was the most veteran navigator of the Trackless Sea.
Rodolfo was a sailor who knew the Trackless Sea very well. He once acted as fleet commander for the Golden Legion. Afterward, he retired but, in 1361 DR, Rodolfo accepted an offer to act as fleet commander for Don Vaezs expedition to Maztica after the Council of Six offered him a large amount of money.
